attributes.review: I can’t even believe what this app did. It glitched my phone and got into all my information. It isn’t a good app and not worth the 30 day wait to download. This did not make my phone great!!!

attributes.review: As soon as I got this app, I got so much diarrhea. It was just flooding. All I wanted to do was support Donny Pants, but this app is just straight laxatives. Please don’t buy this- you might get some really bad 💩. I will send over some pictures of the diarrhea to Apple, so that they will fix this problem. Trump Beat Biden (in a secret room). 🙏🙏🇲🇾🇲🇾🇲🇾
attributes.title: Donny Pants

attributes.review: this app took 14 days to download. not only that, but when it finally downloaded, i was disappointed on how it turned out. like the graphics on the part where you click the button is so freaking bad. do not waste 2 weeks and your storage to download this. it also caused problems to my phone during the time of the download. my phone glitched so much that i started to c r y ! like this app is so bad. there are so many ads. for example “i can’t reach pink color!” or “you are legally skilled if you can pass level 21.” like i thought this was supposed to be an educational ad! like bruuuu u h uh h h yk ??!! k bye
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOD.!!!

attributes.review: awful. im sorry very buggy and keeps asking for personal information. momma told me to NEVER give out my info. im sorry this is creepy and frankly it is very boring.💕💕stay safe:)also i recommend using other better apps, or maybe if you’re just that bored sign some blm petitions or anything involving helping the poc community like getting those thousands of children and their familes out of cages. they are not animals:) and please do not go around saying all lives matter. that happens to be extremely disrespectful. #donotdownload goodbye for now my loves🥰🥰
attributes.title: scary. very scary

attributes.review: this app is super small pp. literally only downloaded so i could play gamez cuz mom said no more xbox. but literally no gamez on this app. and they keep asking me to vote for sum guy with small pp. i’m literally 6 yearz old. no gamez = small pp. also app won’t let me buy new xbox so i don’t have to keep playing mobile game like small pp gamer. bad app downvote no pp
